snippet: The family of Jonathan Ferrell, who while searching for help after an accident was shot to death by a Charlotte, N.C., officer, applauded the city for charging the officer.
abstract: Former college football player Jonathan Ferrell is shot to death by Charlotte, NC, Police Officer Randall Kerrick while searching for help after a car accident; Kerrick will face arraignment on voluntary manslaughter charges.

byline.contributor: Christine Jordan Sexton contributed reporting from Tallahassee, Fla., and John Peragine from Charlotte.

lead_paragraph: The family of Jonathan Ferrell, who while searching for help after an accident was shot to death by a Charlotte, N.C., officer, applauded the city for charging the officer.

headline.main: Asking for Help, Then Killed by an Officer’s Barrage
headline.print_headline: Asking for Help, Then Killed by an Officer’s Barrage
